GSD.description:
btrfs: lock the inode in shared mode before starting fiemap

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit d8c594da79bc0244e610a70594e824a401802be1. For more details please see the references link.
